title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING THE SUPPLEMENTAL INVESTMENT PROGRAM (SIP) FROM GENERAL FUND FOR SUPPLEMENTAL APPROPRIATION AMOUNTING TO TWENTY MILLION EIGHT HUNDRED EIGHTY FOUR THOUSAND EIGHT HUNDRED SEVENTY FIVE PESOS AND 25/100 (PHP 20,884,875.25) CHARGEABLE AGAINST GOVERNMENT EQUITY SURPLUS IN THE AMOUNT OF EIGHTEEN MILLION FIVE HUNDRED THIRTY EIGHT THOUSAND SEVEN HUNDRED FIFTY PESOS (PHP 18,538,750.00); FROM THE OFFICE OF THE MUNICIPAL SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT OFFICER: DONATION (DAMAYAN SA KAPWA PROGRAM) IN THE AMOUNT OF ONE MILLION FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND PESOS (PHP 1,500,000.00); FROM THE OFFICE OF THE MAYOR: MOOE-TRAINING EXPENSE IN THE AMOUNT OF SIX HUNDRED NINETY SIX THOUSAND ONE HUNDRED TWENTY FIVE PESOS AND 25/100; AND FROM THE MO TOURISM OFFICE : REVERSION OF FUNDS FROM OTHER MOOE (DISYEMBRE NA SA LOS BANOS PROGRAM) TO CAPITAL OUTLAY IN THE AMOUNT OF ONE HUNDRED FIFTY THOUSAND PESOS (PHP 150,000.00). Author 2 Council
